    • Uses of DragMode in de.mrapp.android.sidebar

      Methods in de.mrapp.android.sidebar that return DragMode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DragMode DragMode.fromValue(int value)
      Returns the drag mode, which belongs to a specific value.
      DragMode Sidebar.getDragModeWhenHidden()
      Returns the drag mode, which specifies the region, where drag gestures are recognized, when the sidebar is currently hidden.
      DragMode Sidebar.getDragModeWhenShown()
      Returns the drag mode, which specifies the region, where drag gestures are recognized, when the sidebar is currently shown.
      static DragMode DragMode.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static DragMode[] DragMode.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in de.mrapp.android.sidebar with parameters of type DragMode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Sidebar.setDragModeWhenHidden(DragMode dragMode)
      Sets the drag mode, which specifies the region, where drag gestures should be recognized, when the sidebar is currently hidden.
      void Sidebar.setDragModeWhenShown(DragMode dragMode)
      Sets the drag mode, which specifies the region, where drag gestures should be recognized, when the sidebar is currently shown.
